def scan(values):
total = 0
largest = values[0]

for v in values:
    if v < 0
        print("Neg:", v)
    elif v > largest:
        largest = v

    total += v

print("Total =", total)
print("Largest =", largest)


def main():
    nums = [5, -3, 12, 7, 0]
    scan(nums)

main()
